string.name: currentlyStreaming
string.comment: %s is the title of the stream, chosen by the streamer.

string.name: lastStream
string.comment: %s is how long ago the stream was in relative time (e.g. 50 minutes ago). It is displayed in smaller type than the rest of the string.

resources.string: Hues du en Twitch oder YouTube-Kanal?
Füg d\'Stéchwuert \"lichess.org\" an dengem Streamtitel an, oder verwend d\'Kategorie \"Chess\", wann s du op Lichess streamst.
Sträich d\'Stéchwuert, wann s du grad näicht mat Lichess streamst.
Lichess wäert däin Stream automatesch erkennen an follgend Zousazdéngscht aktivéieren:

string.name: rule4
string.comment: the resulting message is: Read our streaming Fairplay FAQ to ensure a fair play for everyone in your stream

resources.string: Lies eis %s fir Fairplay fir jiddereen wärend denge Streams ze garantéieren.
Virdeeler fir Streaming mat engem Stéchwuert
Du kriss een flamboyant Streamer-Symbol ob däin Lichess-Profil.
Gëff un d\'Spëtzt vun der Streamer-Lëscht gesat.
Weis däi Stream an dengen Partien, Turnéier an Etüden.
Däi Stream gëtt vun den Moderatoren iwwerpréift.
Wannechgelift fëll deng Streamer-Informatiounen aus an lued e Bild erop.
Wanns du prett bass als Lichess Streamer gelëscht ze ginn, %s

string.name: requestReview
string.comment:
requestReview
Used as part of the longer sentence: "When you are ready to be listed as a Lichess streamer, request a moderator review"

resources.string: fro eng Iwwerpréifung vun den Moderatoren un

D\'Lichess-Streamer-Säit riicht sech un däi Publikum mat der Sprooch vun denger Streaming-Plattform. Lee déi richteg Standardsprooch fir deng Schach-Streams fest an der App oder dem Déngscht, deen s du fir d\'Iwwerdroung benotz.

string.name: twitchUsername
string.comment:
Appears on the form for setting up your Streamer page: https://lichess.org/streamer/edit
Twitch is a proper noun and refers to the streaming service https://twitch.tv/. Please do not translate the word 'Twitch'.

resources.string: Optional. Eidel loossen, falls net verfügbar

string.name: youTubeChannelId
string.comment:
Appears on the form for setting up your Streamer page: https://lichess.org/streamer/edit
The Channel ID is a special alphanumeric string. See Google's guide here for how to retrieve it: https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/3250431
We encourage translators to match what the Channel ID is called in your language's version of YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced

resources.string: Erziel eis an engem Saz eppes iwwer däi Stream
